com.amplifyframework.core.reachability

Interface Reachability

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PeriodicReachabilityChecker

    public interface Reachability
    Reachability refers to whether or not the client is able to reach a system over a network. This is a different concept than whether or not an Android device has an active interface for communication.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Reachability.OnHostReachableAction
      An action that gets performed when a host is determined to be reachable.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean hasPendingActions()
      Checks if there are any actions that still need to be executed.
      boolean isReachable(Host host)
      Checks if a host is reachable.
      Cancelable whenReachable(Host host, Reachability.OnHostReachableAction onHostReachableAction)
      Perform an action when a host is determined to be reachable.

    • Method Detail

      • hasPendingActions

        boolean hasPendingActions()
        Checks if there are any actions that still need to be executed. In other words, are there any hosts that are still unreachable?
        Returns:
        true if there are hosts for which actions have not been fulfilled, false, otherwise

      • isReachable

        boolean isReachable(Host host)
        Checks if a host is reachable.
        Parameters:
        host - A host to check for reachability
        Returns:
        true if host is reachable; false, otherwise

      • whenReachable

        Cancelable whenReachable(Host host,
                         Reachability.OnHostReachableAction onHostReachableAction)
        Perform an action when a host is determined to be reachable. This call completes as soon as a host is determined to be reachable once; no further calls are placed to the provided action. If you change your mind before the action is called, you can cancel this registration via the returned Cancelable.
        Parameters:
        host - A host which may or may not be reachable
        onHostReachableAction - An action to take when the host is determined to be reachable
        Returns:
        A Cancellable which may be called to de-schedule the action from being called
